uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.exec

Interface ExecService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<ExecService>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExecService

    public interface ExecService
extends AppContextService<ExecService>
    A service to run external commands. This is encapsulated as a service to allow substitution in tests and to re-use common code.
    Author:
    spb

      Run a external command (waiting for it to complete)
      ProcessProxy exec(java.lang.String input, long timeout_milliseconds, java.lang.String command)
      Run a external command with supplied input (waiting for it to complete)
